extendedIngredients.name: cream cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 ounces cream cheese, softened and cubed

extendedIngredients.name: green onions
extendedIngredients.originalString: Sour cream and chopped green onions, optional

extendedIngredients.name: hash brown potatoes
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 package (30 ounces) frozen shredded hash brown potatoes, thawed

recipes.title: Slow Cooker Potato & Ham Soup
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a 4- or 5-qt. slow cooker, combine broth, potatoes, onion and pepper. Cook, covered, on low 6-8 hours.                                                                                           Mash potatoes to desired consistency. Whisk in cream cheese until melted. Stir in ham and milk. Cook, covered, 15-20 minutes longer or until heated through. Serve with sour cream and green onions if desired.                                        Yield: 8 servings (2-1/2 quarts).                                                                                                                         Originally published as Slow Cooker Potato & Ham Soup  in  Simple & Delicious                                                                                                                    Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a 4- or 5-qt. slow cooker, combine broth, potatoes, onion and pepper. Cook, covered, on low 6-8 hours.
Whisk in cream cheese until melted. Stir in ham and milk. Cook, covered, 15-20 minutes longer or until heated through.
Serve with sour cream and green onions if desired.
